name: Wourmoboros
description:
A puzzle game about being a worm.  Made over in 72 hours as a game jam game.

Combine level halves on the level select to play.  When you beat the combined level to complete both halves and unlock new levels.  Visit every space once and reach the exit to complete the level.

Controls
  • a z s x; to select your level
  • Press enter to start the level
  • Move around with the arrow keys
  • r to restart
  • u to undo one step
  • q to return to the level select
  • Press enter, q or any arrow key to exit a complete level
